product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaPoutsicle Hydrating Lip Stain
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSplash on the FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna Poutsicle Hydrating Lip Stain that goes on glossy and leaves behind a soft tint - delivering instant hydration for an effortless, low-maintenance look.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates instantly and all dayFeather- & bleed-resistantLocks in moisture & conditions lips to leave them feeling soft & smoothGoes on glossy - leaves behind a soft tintCustomizable, sheer-to-medium coverageFeatures an oil-in-water innovation with squalene, in a range of vibrant shadesFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesItem 2595119How To UseApply one layer in the center of the lips, working outwards.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Octyldodecanol, Pentylene Glycol, Ceteareth-20, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Red 28 (CI 45410), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply one layer in the center of the lips, working outwards.
ingredients: Ethylhexylglycerin. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: I would love to reorder if there would be better colors
reviews.comments: I really like this product. I bought it not knowing anything about it just really liked the color. went to replace it and could not find it. Went online to order and there are only pink colors. That is the reason for 3stars. Such a disappointment. I would recommend to a friend if they just want pink

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: OH MY SO PRETTY!

reviews.headline: Lasts a long time!
reviews.comments: This lip stain is one of the better out there. The fact you can wipe some away and put another lip gloss on top makes a beautiful look. Though I wish there were more colors, all around the product has impeccable quality as a lip stain. It stands out

reviews.headline: Does NOT last even 1 hour.
reviews.comments: I wanted to love it. Tried several times. It is not a stain

reviews.headline: Favorite lip stain
reviews.comments: I love this stain! It is hydrating without being sticky. The color lasts the entire work day, through breakfast & lunch. Highly recommend you give this one a try. I've used Benefit for a long time and like this one better. Just wish there were more color options.

reviews.headline: Top grade
reviews.comments: Great quality, no dry lips and lasts.

reviews.headline: Omg I just found my new holy grail!
reviews.comments: Ive tried almost every lipstain out there! This is rhe only on ive found that works. Please dont ever discontinue!

reviews.headline: Very Disappointing
reviews.comments: Was very excited to try this. It looked good when first applied, but it did not leave a stain and came off after an hour. I returned it and bought something else!

reviews.headline: Finally a lip color that lasts.
reviews.comments: Love this product.  I got this product in my boxycharm box and i am so glad i did, so excited to now have a lip product that lasts all day!

reviews.headline: Great buy!
reviews.comments: I originally didn't think I would like this product because it had a wet feel when applied, but it goes away. I loved how it looked on me and the fact that I didn't have to apply more over time. It was a great first time buy. I plan to purchase more.

reviews.headline: The BEST
reviews.comments: This is by far the best lip stain I've tried. So moisturizing and long lasting. It lasts literally all day including after eating! Definitely buy!!!

reviews.headline: Beautiful product, but packaging leaks
reviews.comments: Absolutely love the stain in Mai Type. It is long-lasting and moisturizing. I don't apply a full layer, but almost dot it over my lips because it is quite pigmented. I also always apply a moisturizing gloss/balm overtop (the laneige glowy lip balm) and it looks amazing. I've been using this product for over 3 months and it definitely leaks and stains other items if I put it in my bag. So I usually just keep it on my counter due to this issue.

reviews.headline: Love This!
reviews.comments: If you struggle with lip products, this lipstain might be for you. In 20 years of casually wearing makeup, I have never liked a lip product; they dry my lips out and don't last long. This lipstain addresses all of my problems though. It's magic! It's hydrating, long lasting, and doesn't transfer after it dries down. It really holds â€” a large iced tea, fried rice, and a cold windy day did not slow this lipstain down. The dry down is lovely, and while it does fade a little, its still a pretty color hours later.

reviews.headline: Easy nice color
reviews.comments: Lasts, easy not drying.  Light color. Pretty

reviews.headline: There's better out there
reviews.comments: For some reason, I find this to be more drying than others I've tried that don't claim to be moisturizing. The lasting power is also not great on me. It's virtually completely gone after even a light meal, which for a STAIN I find unsatisfactory. The colors are stunning though!

reviews.headline: Not happy at all
reviews.comments: Fades after one hour covergirl lip stain is way more long lasting. I loved the color but like i said it fades BAD QUICKLY no NOT recommend mad I spent the money now i need to go get covergirl stain

reviews.headline: Holy Grail for Dry Lips!
reviews.comments: I've never been able to use lipstick because it always dries out my lips to where they just look cracked and cakey, and I hate the messiness of lip gloss and having to reapply. I've tried lip stains in the past but they either ran too much and were super hard to apply, were patchy, or seemed to dry my lips out even more. I gave up ever wearing anything but lip balm on my lips for years, but I finally decided to try another lip stain. I am so happy I tried this one, because it's perfect! It was super easy to apply: went on smooth, like a gloss. felt very hydrating on my lips. I left it on for 4 minutes before wiping off, which was a bit too long for me for every day wear as it was so pigmented! (which isn't a bad thing at all) I will probably try for only 1-2 minutes befire wiping next time. I finished with a shiny lip balm and I'm truly in love. I saw a lot of comments about people having to reapply, but I think they might have misunderstood the application process. You shouldn't be leaving the stain on for more than like 30 seconds to a few minutes, depending on how deep you want to shade to be. I will be buying more colors in the future for sure! (The shade I used is Mai Tai.)

reviews.headline: Wore this for my wedding and I'm hooked now!
reviews.comments: I wish there were more colors because I love the formula so much! I wore 'Mai Type' for my wedding because i didnt want it to go anywhere throughout the day and its definitely smooch proof! My lips don't feel dry with this and always look great!

reviews.headline: I liked it better than I thought I would...
reviews.comments: This was a very comfortable lip stain.  I wish that the "stain" would last longer.

reviews.headline: Lasts all day
reviews.comments: Love this product, I unfortunately got one that liked to seap leaving the bottle goopy and getting lip stain on anything nearby. My daughter who turned me on to this hasn't had that problem though.

faceoff_positive.comments: I purchased Mai Type and Strawberry Sangria. Holy smokes are these amazing! The formula is lightweight, but creates this magical hydrating sheer, but color-saturated lip gloss that doesn't go everywhere. The applicator is perfect. I let it set for about 20-30 seconds and then went about my business. It doesn't rub off, transfer, bleed, dry out my lips, or do anything it shouldn't do. It simply goes on your lips, keeps them hydrated with gorgeous color, and stays put. Also, I didn't have to blot or set it so that I wouldn't get lipstick on my teeth. I don't need a primer, a lip liner, a brush, etc, now to get perfect lips. Hallelujah, it's a miracle!!! You just put it on and go! I love this so much, I put it on to go pull weeds in my yard because the magic this creates even makes weeding the yard better. I might be sweaty, covered in dirt, and smell terrible, but I look gorgeous. Yes, it's that good. This is my first Fenty product, but I'm seriously eyeing everything else. My only con is that there aren't more colors... I want so many more colors. Please, for the love of all that is holy, never stop making this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best lip color product ever. Period.

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to love this and so many people have given it such a strong review and so many stars. So I'm really sad that I don't fall in love with this as many others did, I think that it was overhyped for sure.  In the pictures I've shown the sheer consistency and how it's buildable. Showing first one layer,  than 2 ,than 3. I noticed the longer it stays on,it does leave a stronger tint of color. AND warning!!! It does stain!!. I definitely will not be buying,nor recommending at this point. I'm going to go ahead and try to work with it and see if maybe I can get it to work a different way,and maybe pairing it with some darker lip liner.if not I've seen where people have used it as blush. I just didn't see it coming on top of other lip stains or lip tints that I have used in the past. It didn't leave my lips hydrated as it claims to do. Did I mention I wanted to love this?!?
faceoff_negative.headline: So disappointed
